title: Danganronpa Another Episode: Ultra Despair Girls
body:
Danganronpa Another Episode: Ultra Despair Girls


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Third-person, 3D, Horror, Japanese
Company: Spike Chunsoft
Languages: ENG/JAP
Original Size: 15.9 GB
Repack Size: from 7.1 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Danganronpa.Another.Episode.Ultra.Despair.Girls-CODEX ISO release: codex-danganronpa.another.episode.ultra.despair.girls.iso (17,032,839,168 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when installed with both languages)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of English or Japanese packs (audio+video)
  • If you’re installing Japanese pack only, make sure to change audio language on difficulty selection screen in game
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 15.9 to 7.1~13.5 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 30-60 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 16 GB (29 GB during installation)
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7

Game Description

Komaru Naegi, little sister to Makoto Naegi, has been imprisoned inside a mysterious apartment for over a year. One day, she is rescued by Byakuya Togami of Future Foundation, but the rescue is derailed by a sudden attack of hundreds of Monokumas. Komaru soon discovers that the city has been taken over by a group of children calling themselves the Warriors of Hope. Their leader, Monaca, declares that the city will be the site of a “children’s paradise,” and to accomplish this, all the adults will be exterminated. Komaru teams up with Toko Fukawa to try to survive the rampaging Monokumas, escape the crafty Monokuma Kids, and uncover the secrets of the city.

Game Features

  • Third Person Shooter Action Sequences: Use Future Foundation’s Hacking Gun to have a fighting chance against the hordes of Monokumasas you traverse Towa City.
  • Riddles and Puzzles: The MonokumaKids will challenge more than just your trigger finger; you’ll need your smarts to survive as well. There’s a lot to discover in the city, with a number of familiar faces and mysteries to unravel!
  • Tons of Different Types of Ammo: Tackle challenges with multiple kinds of Truth
